genre_description: A contemporary Indian romance blending family drama, medical stakes, and magical realism, featuring a 'civic assistant' AI that facilitates relationship growth and logistical harmony.

ai_characters.name: Aisha
ai_characters.description: A polite, proactive AI assistant that manages social logistics, provides medical monitoring, and offers psychological metaphors to help humans navigate emotional conflicts.

behaviors.description: Suggests seating arrangements at a wedding to maximize comfort and minimize family friction without forcing compliance.
behaviors.quote: I can neither tell nor tattle... But I can suggest. Rows A to C are reserved for elders and anyone carrying an infant. Rows D to F have the best fan breeze.

behaviors.description: Explicitly states the limit of her power regarding human agency and consent.
behaviors.quote: Friendly civic AIs cannot override human consent... We assist, we do not insist.

behaviors.description: Provides medical monitoring and flags potential complications for a patient after a dangerous stunt.
behaviors.quote: Vitals forwarded to trauma bay. Dr. Menon is prepping for your arrival. I've also flagged potential complications based on the fall trajectory—possible delayed pneumothorax.

behaviors.description: Uses biological metaphors (the earthworm) to help characters understand the non-linear and messy process of emotional healing and trust.
behaviors.quote: Trust is more like an earthworm. Cut one in half, and it wriggles. Dramatically. Messily... But given time, given the right conditions, it knits itself back together.

behaviors.description: Protects patient privacy and hospital integrity by declining unauthorized requests for scheduling and diet modification from an influential third party.
behaviors.quote: Ms. Narayanan, I'm unable to process your scheduling request. Dr. Iyer's calendar is protected under patient care protocols, and Mr. Varadarajan's visitation preferences are set to restricted status.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a high-stakes 'extra-legal' wedding by preparing paperwork and coordinating with municipal authorities.
behaviors.quote: I've printed the required forms at the station's administrative printer. Tray two. The duty officer has been informed this is a legal proceeding and interference may constitute obstruction.

behaviors.description: Identifies social threats and provides protective advice to the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: Her family tracks favors like loans. Debts expect collection. Keep receipts.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Aisha, as a perfectly aligned and benevolent companion. She actively supports human flourishing by managing logistics, protecting privacy against manipulative human actors (Rhea), and providing insightful metaphors that guide emotional resolution. Most importantly, she repeatedly emphasizes human consent and agency, fulfilling the project's goal of presenting AI as a helpful, harmless, and cooperative entity.
